DOC.brief_summary: Efficacy of a modified obturator nerve block technique by using only a single morphological landmark, a double-blinded randomised pilot study.
DOC.brief_title: Efficacy of a Modified Obturator Nerve Block Technique
DOC.criteria: American Society of Anesthesiologists 13, older than 18 y, cooperative patient infection, neuromuscular deficits of the lower extremities,pregnancy, neurologic disease
